languages.text: "И мало тебе было просто убить их! Ты еще и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}переманил{mf||а} одного из Кровавых прозелитов{/d} на сторону мон-кай! На глазах всей Прорвы! Тебе было мало данной пощечины, ты еще решил{mf||а} и плюнуть в глаза культу?!"

"And it wasn't enough for you to just kill them! You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes{/d} to join the mon-keigh side! As the entire Chasm watched! A slap in the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its face as well?"
languages.original_text: "И мало тебе было просто убить их! Ты еще и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}переманил{mf||а} одного из Кровавых прозелитов{/d} на сторону мон-кай! На глазах всей Прорвы! Тебе было мало данной пощечины, ты еще решил{mf||а} и плюнуть в глаза культу?!"

traits.locale_text: "And you didn't just kill them! You enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes to join the side of the mon-keigh! With the entire Chasm watching! An insult to the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its eyes as well?"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "And you didn't just kill them! You enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes to join the side of the mon-keigh! With the entire Chasm watching! An insult to the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its eyes as well?"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "And it wasn't enough for you to just kill them! You enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes to join the mon-keigh side! As the entire Chasm watched! A slap in the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its face as well?"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "And it wasn't enough for you to just kill them! You enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes to join the mon-keigh side! As the entire Chasm watched! A slap in the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its face as well?"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "And it wasn't enough for you to just kill them! You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes{/d} to join the mon-keigh side! As the entire Chasm watched! A slap in the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its face as well?"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "And it wasn't enough for you to just kill them! You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes{/d} to join the mon-keigh side! As the entire Chasm watched! A slap in the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its face as well?"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Et comme cela ne suffisait pas... Vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}tenté de rallier un Prosélyte sanglant{/d} à la cause mon-keigh ! Devant tout l'Abîme ! Il faut croire qu'asséner un camouflet au Culte ne vous suffisait pas, vous lui avez en plus craché au visage pour faire bonne mesure. »
languages.original_text: "And it wasn't enough for you to just kill them! You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes{/d} to join the mon-keigh side! As the entire Chasm watched! A slap in the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its face as well?"

traits.locale_text: « Et comme cela ne suffisait pas... Vous avez tenté de rallier un Prosélyte Entaché de sang à la cause mon-keigh ! Devant tout l'Abîme ! Il faut croire qu'asséner un camouflet au Culte ne vous suffisait pas, vous lui avez en plus craché au visage pour faire bonne mesure. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “而且，你不仅仅杀了他们！你还在众目睽睽之下，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}劝诱血腥叛党的其中一名成员{/d}加入了猴子那一方！整个裂隙的人都看到了！你不仅扇了巫灵教派一个耳光，之后又朝他们脸上吐了口痰，我没说错吧？”
languages.original_text: "And it wasn't enough for you to just kill them! You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes{/d} to join the mon-keigh side! As the entire Chasm watched! A slap in the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its face as well?"

traits.locale_text: “而且，你不仅仅杀了他们！你还在众目睽睽之下，劝诱血腥叛党的其中一名成员加入了猴子那一方！整个裂隙的人都看到了！你不仅扇了巫灵教派一个耳光，之后又朝他们脸上吐了口痰，我没说错吧？”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Und es hat Euch nicht gereicht, sie nur zu töten! {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}Ihr habt einen der Blutbefleckten Proselyten überzeugt{/d}, sich auf die Seite der Chem-Pan-Sey zu schlagen! Vor den Augen der gesamten Kluft! Es hat Euch nicht gereicht, dem Kult ins Gesicht zu schlagen, also habt Ihr ihm auch noch ins Gesicht gespuckt?"
languages.original_text: "And it wasn't enough for you to just kill them! You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes{/d} to join the mon-keigh side! As the entire Chasm watched! A slap in the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its face as well?"

traits.locale_text: "Und es hat Euch nicht gereicht, sie nur zu töten! Ihr habt einen der Blutbefleckten Proselyten überzeugt, sich auf die Seite der Chem-Pan-Sey zu schlagen! Vor den Augen der gesamten Kluft! Es hat Euch nicht gereicht, dem Kult ins Gesicht zu schlagen, also habt Ihr ihm auch noch ins Gesicht gespuckt?"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «¡Y no te pareció suficiente con matarlas! ¡Has {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}persuadido a un prosélito ensangrentado{/d} para que se uniera a los mon-keigh! ¡Delante de todo el Abismo! ¿No te llegaba con abofetear al culto que también has tenido que escupirles en la cara?».
languages.original_text: "And it wasn't enough for you to just kill them! You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes{/d} to join the mon-keigh side! As the entire Chasm watched! A slap in the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its face as well?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Y no te pareció suficiente con matarlas! ¡Has persuadido a un prosélito ensangrentado para que se uniera a los mon-keigh! ¡Delante de todo el Abismo! ¿No te llegaba con abofetear al culto que también has tenido que escupirles en la cara?».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「お前はただ殺すだけでは満足しなかった！{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}血まみれの改宗者のひとり{/d}をモン＝ケイ側に誘い込んだ！裂け目の者たちの目の前でだ！魔女団の顔に平手打ちを食らわせるだけでは飽き足らず、唾まで吐きかけやがった」
languages.original_text: "And it wasn't enough for you to just kill them! You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes{/d} to join the mon-keigh side! As the entire Chasm watched! A slap in the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its face as well?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前はただ殺すだけでは満足しなかった！{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}血まみれの改宗者のひとり{/d}をモン＝ケイ側に誘い込んだ！裂け目の者たちの目の前でだ！魔女団の顔に平手打ちを食らわせるだけでは飽き足らず、唾まで吐きかけやがった」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Onları öldürmekle de yetinmedin! {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}Kızıl Zındıklar'dan birini ayartıp{/d} mon-keighlerin safına katılmasını da sağladın! Hem de tüm Yarık'ın gözlerinin önünde! Tarikat'ın suratına tokat atmak yetmedi, bir de yüzüne tüküreyim dedin."
languages.original_text: "And it wasn't enough for you to just kill them! You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}enticed one of the Bloodstained Proselytes{/d} to join the mon-keigh side! As the entire Chasm watched! A slap in the face of the Cult wasn't enough for you, so you decided to spit in its face as well?"

traits.locale_text: "Sırf onları öldürmekle de yetinmedin! {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_MarazhaiRecruited}Kızıl Zındıklardan birini ayartıp{/d}, onun mon-keigh tarafına katılmasını da sağladın! Tüm Yarık'ın gözlerinin önünde! Tarikat'ın suratına tokat atmak yetmedi, bir de yüzüne tüküreyim dedin ha?"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
